entry.title: The American Data Privacy and Protection Act Would Be a Bipartisan Triumph—If it Could Pass
entry.summary: Not a month ago, 53 House lawmakers voted, for the first time this century, to send a comprehensive federal privacy bill to the floor. It was a laudable achievement, but it’s been frozen in place ever since. Now, with fewer than 100 days until the midterm elections, any hope of getting national privacy reform done… Read more...

entry.title: 老用户转 29 元套餐成功了
entry.summary: 27149: 因为自己号码还凑合，且用了这么多年了，所以还是想转过来，不想办新号了。 流程： 1 、打 10010 ，转客服； 2 、和人工客服说，要求转 29 元大王卡套餐；——客服表示操作不了，记录下给你升级； 3 、几小时后升级的客服给你打电话，说他们后台里 29 元的套餐是没有 70G 全国流量的，我说那你是的问题不是我的问题；他表示理解，记录后再升级； 4 、第二天客服给我打电话，转了，不需要去营业厅，电话里输入服务密码，下月生效； 5 、稍后收到了办理成功短信，上图费劲我就不上了。 整个流程没有撕逼，挺简单的。办完一个月话费省 2/3 吧。其实我还记录了一些截图，还办了一张新卡（未开，不打算开了）来撕逼，但全程比较顺利和快速。

entry.title: [杭州] 招聘中级前端工程师，薪资[10k-20k]
entry.summary: dodogod: 岗位职责 参与公司新品网页端界面开发工作(B2B2C) 参与对已有公司组件进行代码整理与优化工作，提升代码质量 优化已有组件视觉与交互效果，提升用户体验 职业要求 具有 3 年以上前端研发经验，前端技术功底扎实; 具有良好的编码风格，有较强的独立工作能力和团队合作精神。 熟练使用 Vue.js 框架，了解框架基本原理; 熟悉常见的前端优化技巧，对代码质量有追求; 有 NodeJs 开发经验的优先; 有 echarts 使用经验的优先; 较强的逻辑思维能力，自驱力强，主动性强。 其他： 能够阅读英文技术文档说明，拥有 CET-4 证书； 计算机及相关专业毕业的优先； 有极客特质的优先，比如参与过开源项目，贡献过代码； 特别努力认真严谨的优先 关于我们 公司位于玉皇山基金小镇二期，为私募行业提供智能分析等服务。创始人为华尔街从业多年海归，公司业务发展迅速。 公司环境优美，氛围和睦，工作时间早八点半至晚六点，一般情况不加班，适合热爱技术，自我驱动，性格乐观向上，有团队观念的伙伴加入。 联系方式 有意向的小伙伴请发简历到邮箱 echo Z3VhbnpoYW9ockBnbWFpbC5jb20K | base64 --decode

entry.title: 请教 drf 全局封装 response 的优雅实现
工作流是否支持可选的节点分发功能
entry.summary: wangxiaoaer: 有个系统涉及到申请、审批，看起来常规工作流引擎应该都支持，但是有几点拿不准，想请教下大家： 1 用户体系不一样：申请的用户和审批的用户不是一个来源。比如申请人可以是整个互联网用户，审批的人可能是公司那些带有领导职务的人员，一层一层那种。这和我理解的传统业务如 OA 、钉钉请假这种不太一样，后面这些貌似申请、审批人员都是一个租户内的。 2 某些节点需要进行可选分发：比如某个节点，当前岗位的处理人员可以自行处理后往下一步流转，也可以分发给其他人员审核，等所有人返回后再决定是否往下一步走。（理论上，如果有某个分发人员拒绝了，那就不能继续走下去） 3 节点处理既要读也要写：节点处理的时候，不仅仅可以看到信息，也需要补充一些信息，比如给当前用户打个标签等等。此外，不同节点可以读的信息也是有区别的，用户申请填了很多信息，那么节点 1 可能就只关心性别、年龄等信息，节点 2 可能只关心学历等，从用户体验上来说，每个节点的处理人员只看到自己的是合适的。 基于以上几点，想问问现有的工作流支持如何？ 收费方案也行

entry.title: 最近才明白淘宝的 Spotify 黑产是怎么运作的
entry.summary:
shwintan: 平时没注意，今年开始重度使用 Spotify 作为主力听歌软件，其实在三个月前去续费的时候就有点发现不对，发现设置里有 3 个月免费试用，当时没在意，直到我昨天又找了一家店想购买一年的会员.... 我承认是贪小便宜，不到一百块可以买到一年的会员，结果发现了端倪，提供账号密码后等了一段时间让我重新登录，发现头像没了，然后和一个朋友互 fo 也掉了，当时找卖家说是因为重置了账号，然后我翻邮箱发现我原先账号的 email 被改，所以我推测是这样的逻辑： 卖家会克隆一个账户出来（转移所有的喜欢列表和播放列表、甚至把关注的音乐人也关注回来） 然后把原先的密码改掉 把邮箱绑定到新的账户上，旧的账号绑定到其他随机的邮箱上 一般人是可能看不出来 一般在这里会绑定一个外币卡然后用三个月试用（我觉得过了三个月后就跑路） 奉上淘宝店家的回复：
到最后我为了找回账号注册了一个和修改后邮箱一致的账号，还好没人注册，然后找回密码最后拿到了原先的账户... 然后我刚才看了眼邮箱记录..发现每次我相关所谓的续费都是这种套路...邮箱都被修改到新的账号上，所以我一开始注册的不知道都换皮多少次了:( 所以淘宝上我认为基本上那些三个月续费、续费的都是这种套路，如果想用 Spotify 会员还是最好上家庭车比较好一点.... 但是如果不介意这点的话另说，十几块的价格其实是白让卖家赚了～因为免费试用三个月
每次续费都是这种操作

entry.title: Build in public 记录: 我们是如何开发 TinySnap 的
entry.summary:
dearroy: 文章发布于： https://tinysnap.app/blog/how-we-built-tinysnap-the-anatomy-of-a-browser-extension/ 背景 其实 Chrome Web Store 中已经存在非常多的屏幕截图扩展了，但制作 TinySnap 的核心理念还是希望可以帮助繁忙的创业者、开发者以及营销人员提高生产力，尤其是那些有着完美主义情怀的人。我们想要用户在最短的时间内完成 “截图-美化-发布” 的过程。 输出之后的截图如下：
正如 Leila Hock 所说：“It’s not hard work–work is work, and yes, some work requires more brain power, but most of us smart people like that and want more of it, so let’s stop calling it hard. Let’s call it productive. Effective. Valuable. Anything that speaks to nature over quantity, because that’s what we need more of.” 这不是艰苦的工作——工作就是工作，是的，有些工作需要更多的脑力，但我们大多数聪明人都喜欢这样，并且想要更多，所以让我们停止说它很难。 让我们称之为生产力。 有效的。 有价值的。 任何与自然对话超过数量的东西，因为这是我们需要更多的东西。 这就是我们开发构造 TinySnap 的原因。 当我们想要开始做浏览器拓展时，占有率最高的浏览器是 Google Chrome ，我们自然是要从这里开始。 Google Chrome 在 web extension 上表现得一直…

entry.title: 腾讯王卡限定版 联通王卡限定版下单链接
entry.summary: tryxd: 1 、车还在吗？ A：王卡助手小程序的入口已经关了，而且该卡据说有些地区已经发公告停了（原因暂不知晓）。但目前还可以通过拼接 URL 的方式找到末班车入口并下单。 下单成功是否砍单目前不知道，上车方法在文末讲。 2 、月租是 19 还是 29 ？ A：联通官方口径是首充 50 得 100 ，相当于前 5 个月每月 19 元，然后恢复 29 元 /月。但网友发现腾讯王卡可以退订基础包 10 元套餐，退订后月租就可以保持 19 元 /月了。（目前退订 10 元基础套餐不知道会有什么影响，但从联通客服的回复看，影响不大，聊天截图： https://imgur.com/1OuVP2G 和 https://imgur.com/a/8O23CYA ） 3 、怎么把「月租宝 5 元 1G 」改成「日租宝 1 元 1G 」？ A：在王卡助手，回复「畅听升级」，订购后，然后在王卡助手，个人中心，月租日租转换，等转换成功，再去退畅听升级 10 元包。 4 、怎么把「 30G 定向流量改 40G 定向流量」？ A：去公众号：王卡助手—王卡福利社—专属流量—免费升级权益领 10G 定向把 30G 定向申请升级到 40G 定向。 5 、怎么选心怡的靓号？ A：百度搜索扫靓号，找个扫号的网页或 APP ，扫到合适的在下单页面输尾号查出该靓号即可。页面上放出的号放心选，没有靓号协议。 6 、下单后，要上传身份证实名吗？ A：下单成功后，会收到联通的短信，打开一个官方链接上传身份证，上传后联通才会派人上门开卡。 7 、下单后，可以让联通快递给我卡吗？ A：默认联通官方人员上门开卡。王卡助手发送"客服"接入客服，可以找客服申请物流发货。 8 、下单后，怎么查看自己买的是不是王卡限定版？ A：到联通官网查看： https://m.10010.com/myorder/ 9 、除了腾讯王卡限定版，有其他选择吗？ A：还有 29/月 的联通王卡和阿里宝卡（支付宝里找），套餐内容大差不差，但以上的一些变更套餐包的奇技淫巧可能不通用，比如说无法退订基础包。自己甄别。 腾讯王卡限定版 无 aff : https://txwk.10010.com/kcardorder/gotoUid?state=KCARD_WKPEN_COMMOM_ORDERLAND&pageKey=4b16073dF0&IdType=union_id 有 aff: https://txwk.10010.com/kcardorder/gotoUid?state=KCARD_WKPEN_COMMOM_ORDERLAND&pageKey=4b16073dF0&IdType=union_id&ShareID=y-OTSbTbMr6_pdICCnr306cnw8cglXxHADX8Qy3ycsc&channel=01-0379-a5ar-a6xw&ADTAG=01-0379-a5ar-a6xw 联通王卡限定版 支付宝搜索阿里宝卡

entry.title: 大佬们 Mac 上有没有轻度的作图工具？就是做个 bannar 啊 封面啊 不需要 PS 这种太专业的
entry.summary: revival83: 求大佬们推荐，真的是驾驭不了 Photoshop

entry.title: Devoid of Surroundings, Grainy Colored Pencil Portraits by Uli Knörzer Emphasize a Subject’s Distinct Demeanor
entry.summary: Berlin-based artist Uli Knörzer (previously) highlights the signature grainy texture of colored pencils in his faithful portraiture. Whether for personal projects or commissions from fashion labels and publications—many of the pieces shown here are part of a recent project for Tommy Hilfiger—the richly illustrated works hone in on the emotions of the subject. By positioning the figures against monochromatic backdrops devoid of setting, he accentuates the minute details of their facial expressions and body language. More

entry.title: Fantastical Hybrid Characters by Toco-Oco Imagine the Mysteries of Human Nature
entry.summary: Playfully curious, a troupe of hybrid characters dreamed up by the Brazil-based Toco-Oco (previously) has an inclination for the mythical. Figures sporting feathered suits and wolves cradling human heads are imbued with mystery, and together, the otherworldly cast becomes a metaphor for the varied, emotional, and sometimes bewildering nature of human existence. Toco-Oco, which is helmed by Lara Alcântara and Guilherme Neumann, sells prints and the small sculptures, which are made of wax, wood, and clay, in its shop, although the works sell out incredibly quickly, so be sure to keep an eye on Instagram for information about new releases. More

entry.title: Humor Infuses Exaggerated Features in Lola Dupre’s Meticulously Distorted Collages
entry.summary: Glasgow-based artist Lola Dupre’s evocative and often humorous photographic collages of animals, historic images, and portraits tap into the unique personalities and emotions of her subjects. A cross-eyed cat has its vision multiplied, and a Shiba Inu’s joyful face pokes out of an enormous body in a play on repetition and perception. Dupre captures a range of expressions in both human and animal form (previously), exaggerating a raised eyebrow or fuzzy paw by layering numerous pieces of paper to extend legs, arm, eyes, and other features. More

entry.title: 8 Bugs Scientists Want You to Squash Immediately
entry.summary:
Insects are cool (if you look past all the legs). They break down dead things by eating them and pollinate plants so that we can grow enough crops to feed the world. Conservation encourages us to protect wildlife, especially bugs that are now looking down the barrel of an insect apocalypse.
Read more...

entry.title: Scratchy Pencil-and-Ink Drawings by Jon Carling Conjure Mythical Beings and Surreal Sorcery
entry.summary: From his studio in northern California, artist Jon Carling summons the metaphysical by scrawling scenes tinged with magic and whimsy. He works in pen and pencil, layering lines and wispy markings into a wave of florals enveloping a levitating figure or a beam radiating from a woman’s eyes. Many of the works feature an element of hidden sorcery, veiling the largely natural subject matter with mysteriously powerful energy. Although devoid of color, Carling’s drawings capture the trippy, psychedelic imaginations associated with the rock music that dominated the Sixties and Seventies and provided the soundtrack for his childhood home. More

entry.title: Interview: Production Designer Liz Toonkel Describes Creating the Adorable Universe of ‘Marcel the Shell with Shoes On’
entry.summary: A tiny mollusk with a big personality, Marcel the Shell with Shoes On is famous for quirky antics and endlessly entertaining use of human-sized objects. In a new interview supported by Colossal Members, production designer Liz Toonkel discusses building the universe the adorable character occupies in the feature-length mockumentary released this summer from A24. All of those little details that you wouldn’t think about, when you watch it they give it an inherent truth because everything feels like it does in our real world. More

entry.title: Filled with Light, An A-Frame House Designed by Naturvillan Functions Entirely Off the Grid
entry.summary: Mimicking the peaks of the surrounding conifers, an A-frame house in Sikhall, Vänersborg, Sweden is designed for entirely self-sufficient living. The largely wood and glass construction is the project of Naturvillan, a Swedish architecture firm focusing on building homes with minimal impacts on the environment. The triangular model shown here is “Atri,” a light-filled house with a wood-burning stove and solar panels attached to its slanted roof. Intended for energy production in both winter and summer, the two sources are robust enough to heat the water and provide electricity. More

entry.title: RISD Continuing Education Opens Fall Registration With 10 Online Certificates
entry.summary: Choose from more than 140 courses for adults and youth ages 13 to 17 this fall at Rhode Island School of Design Continuing Education, including options for beginning, intermediate, and advanced students. Enroll by August 23 to save 10% with the code EARLYBIRDCE. This fall, RISD CE online courses offer adult students a range of courses for all skill levels that can be taken at any time of day or night, from anywhere in the world. More

entry.title: Discarded Tools, Scrap Metals, and Fabrics Form the Spirited Sculptures by Mohsen Heydari Yeganeh
entry.summary: Artist Mohsen Heydari Yeganeh extends the life of broken tools, wooden handles, and scraps of fabric found in resale shops, stalls, and alleys. Utilizing chains for plumage or a long, steel blade for a beak, Yeganeh forms stylized animalistic assemblages of discarded materials, which he refers to as “flying garbages.” Conveying the awkward, jutting postures of birds or the broad stance of a bison, the spirited sculptures combine abstract components into lively, expressive characters. More

entry.title: Underwater Photos by Steven Kovacs Frame the Shimmering Unearthly Bodies of Larval Fish
entry.summary: Set against the stark backdrops attainable only during blackwater dives, larval fish become strange, otherworldly specimens with glasslike bodies and translucent fins that billow outward. Their delicate, still-developing anatomies are the subjects of Steven Kovacs’s underwater photos, which frame the young creatures at such precarious stages of life. Living in Palm Beach, Kovacs (previously) frequents the waters off the Florida coasts, although he’s also recently explored areas near Kona, Hawaii. More

entry.title: In Graham Franciose’s ‘Morning Coffee Paintings,’ Dreamlike Watercolor Works Capture the Day’s Unmediated Emotion
entry.summary: Many days, artist and illustrator Graham Franciose sits down with watercolor, gouache, and a small sheet of cotton paper to paint a whimsical scene or surreal moment. A skateboarder carries a tree in a backpack, an anxious figure peeks through a colorful monster mask, and an oversized lion snarls at an approaching man. “I like to do these first thing in the morning when I am still not fully awake and start with a blank slate and no preconceived idea,” he tells Colossal. More
